page.title: 05FARMING AROUND MILTON.
page.content: I live in the gamekeeper's cottage at Balgonie Castle,1 km west of Milton.My dad is the farm mechanic.Bellfield, Bankhead,Duniface,Balfour Mains,Little Lun,Grantsfield and Cameron farms are in our block,and much of Byresloan, Treaton and Newton Hall.The McKendrick family,farming Bellfield and Cameron, have prize winning{friesian dairy } {herds.}All farms are now growing a little{oil seed rape,}but,apart from Duniface where crops grow,the rest are mainly cattle farms.Bellfield cows have been inside all winter but now they are in the fields beside the school.Sometimes a field is let to a shepherd.I went to see the{sheep}being dipped in a long pool.They went in at one end and out at the other.The shepherd pushed their heads under once with his crook to make sure they were all disinfected.
